COMMENT_TX: $David Ortiz reached base 10 consecutive times
$Manny Ramirez' 23rd post-season home run to top Bernie Williams' mark
$the seven runs were the most scored by any team in one extra inning in post-season history
$infield shifted to right for David Ortiz
$infield shifted to right for Travis Hafner
$Mike Lowell took the throw on SB; moved back toward 3B for the rest of Travis Hafner's at bat
$infield shifted to right for David Ortiz

$Asdrubal Cabrera hit a pop foul on the first pitch that Kevin Youkilis ran down the line to catch; he juggled the ball, eventually dropping it; Franklin Gutierrez properly ran after Youkilis first touched the ball but had to go back to 3B when the ball was dropped
$the first time a team hit 3 consecutive homers in the LCS; the third time the Red Sox have hit back-to-back homers in the 2007 post-season; first time for a team to do that
$the ball hit the top of the wall and came back onto the field; Manny Ramirez did not run it out, thinking it was a home run and only reached 1B before the Red Sox complained about the call
$infield shifted to right for David Ortiz
$David Ortiz hit the ball through the left side of the infield where no one was standing

$on the 3-0 pitch, Kenny Lofton flipped his bat to the ground and had to pick it up when it was a strike; after he hit the fly ball, Josh Beckett yelled at him and Lofton ran towards the mound; both benches cleared but the umpires and others kept the peace
$into the CF TV camera box
$infield shifted to right for David Ortiz

$Kevin Youkilis hit the ball off the LF wall and ran half way to 2B; Kenny Lofton threw the ball to 2B; Asdrubal Cabrera started to chase Youkilis back to 1B while watching Dustin Pedroia at 3B; Cabrera's toss to Ryan Garko hit Youkilis' helmet and rolled into foul territory, allowing Pedroia to score; the Indians made a half-hearted attempt to claim that Youkilis moved into the throw
$Ryan Garko stepped on the bag and threw to 2B with Kevin Youkilis trapped between the bases; Garko's throw bounced and went into CF
$the grounder hit the lip of the grass and bounced over Jhonny Peralta
$Julio Lugo called off Manny Ramirez and the ball drifted
$the ball went over the 3B bag and curved into foul territory, striking the stands and bouncing into short LF
$into the Monster Seats
$Casey Blake and Jhonny Peralta collided in the same area where Julio Lugo dropped the popup in the top of the 7th; no one touched the ball and it bounced into the seats
$Coco Crisp caught the ball and ran into the wall at the bullpen; he limped into the infield where the celebration was taking place
